channel.title: Bash on Jupiter notes
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Jupiter notes

item.title: Commands that save much effort
item.description: Search in the contents of nested files: grep -rnw . -e "word to search for" | less in less text viewer, write /word and click enter to search for it, then use n to go for next occurance, Shift+n to go backwards, and q to exit Compile your markdown file to PDF with auto generated table of contents pandoc --pdf-engine=xelatex --toc -f markdown-implicit_figures --variable colorlinks=true input.md -o output.pdf Specifying engine for pandoc --pdf-engine=weasyprint can help you in certain cases
